subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods, returning to the PGA Tour from back surgery, shot a 74 in the first round of the Quicken Loans National. The leader, Greg Chalmers, posted a five-under 66.
snippet: Tiger Woods, returning to the PGA Tour from back surgery, shot a 74 in the first round of the Quicken Loans National. The leader, Greg Chalmers, posted a five-under 66.
